languages.text: {n}Адальберт хватается за грудь и испуганно восклицает:{/n} "Ради спасения вашей же души — этот разговор окончен!"
{n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in a fearful voice,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"
languages.original_text: {n}Адальберт хватается за грудь и испуганно восклицает:{/n} "Ради спасения вашей же души — этот разговор окончен!"

{n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in fear,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"

languages.text: {n}Pris de frayeur, Adalbert porte ses mains à sa poitrine et s'exclame :{/n} « Dans l'intérêt du salut de votre âme, je mets fin à cette conversation ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in a fearful voice,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pris de frayeur, Adalbert porte ses mains à sa poitrine et s'exclame :{/n} « Dans l'intérêt du salut de votre âme, je mets fin à cette conversation ! »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert se lleva la mano al pecho y exclama con voz temerosa:{/n} «¡Por la salvación de su alma, daré esta conversación por terminada!».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in a fearful voice,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert se lleva la mano al pecho y exclama con voz temerosa:{/n} «¡Por la salvación de su alma, daré esta conversación por terminada!».

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特紧紧捂住胸口，恐惧地高喊起来。{/n}“为了您自己的灵魂着想，这场谈话就到此为止吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in a fearful voice,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特紧紧捂住胸口，恐惧地高喊起来。{/n}“为了您自己的灵魂着想，这场谈话就到此为止吧！”

languages.text: {n}アダルバートは胸に手を当て、恐怖の叫びをあげた。{/n} 「自分の魂の救済のために、この話は終わりだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in a fearful voice,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートは胸に手を当て、恐怖の叫びをあげた。{/n} 「自分の魂の救済のために、この話は終わりだ！」

languages.text: {n}Adalbert greift sich ans Herz und ruft mit ängstlicher Stimme:{/n} "Zum Wohle der Erlösung Eurer eigenen Seele ist diese Unterhaltung beendet!"
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in a fearful voice,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert greift sich ans Herz und ruft mit ängstlicher Stimme:{/n} "Zum Wohle der Erlösung Eurer eigenen Seele ist diese Unterhaltung beendet!"

languages.text: {n}Adalbert göğsünü kavrıyor ve korku dolu bir sesle tepki veriyor.{/n} "Sizin kendi ruhunuzun kurtuluşu adına bu konuşmayı sonlandırıyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert clutches his chest and exclaims in a fearful voice,{/n} "For the sake of your own soul's salvation, this conversation is over!"
